price: 69. Boye ozali kornona te ete: Baye bazali kobundisa mikapo mia Allah ba pengwisami (na bosembo)?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أَنَّىٰ يُصۡرَفُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna yujādilūna fī āyāti al-lahi annā yuṣ'rafūna
